Post.title: ssh key
Post._content:
![](http://odue27cqx.bkt.clouddn.com/git_1.jpg)

## GitSSH keys

Gitgitgit

SSHGit

<!-- more -->

SSH [this nice tutorial by DigitalOcean](https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/understanding-the-ssh-encryption-and-connection-process).

### 

shellWindows

**Windows Command Prompt:**
``` bash
type %userprofile%\.ssh\id_rsa.pub
```

**Git Bash on Windows / GNU/Linux / macOS / PowerShell:**
``` bash
cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub
```

<font color=#ff0000>ssh-rsa</font>****.


- <font color=#ff0000>id_dsa.pub</font>
- <font color=#ff0000>id_ecdsa.pub</font>
- <font color=#ff0000>id_ed25519.pub</font>

### 

1.

**Git Bash on Windows / GNU/Linux / macOS:**
``` bash
ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "your.email@example.com" -b 4096
```

**Windows:**
git

2.
SSH
<font color=#ff0000>.ssh/config</font>()

3.Enter
<font color=#ff0000>ssh-keygen -p <keyname></font>.

4.


**macOS:**
``` bash
pbcopy < ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub
```

**GNU/Linux (requires the xclip package):**
``` bash
xclip -sel clip < ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub
```

**Windows Command Line:**
``` bash
type %userprofile%\.ssh\id_rsa.pub | clip
```

**Git Bash on Windows / Windows PowerShell:**
``` bash
cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub | clip
```

5.Git

Post.title: Hexo Tutorial
Post._content:
![](http://odue27cqx.bkt.clouddn.com/mountain.jpg)

Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

<!--More-->

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

<!--More-->

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)
